doc.repnme: Peru handwashing public private initiative - 2005 highlights
doc.abstracts: The handwashing public private partnership was established in 2003 with the main objective to promote and institutionalize the handwashing practice with soap among low income families, to significantly reduce children diarrhea incidence and mortality in the country. A behavioral study was performed during the first year, fundraising became a key activity during the first two years, and implementation started in 2005. So far, important lessons have been gathered in the process of partnership building, as a wide range of institutions have joined the effort at different stages and, as 2006 begins, this seems to be a powerful growing trend.
